type.name: org.gradle.tooling.connection.GradleConnectionBuilder.ParticipantBuilder
type.description: * Builds a new participant that will be included in the connection.

method.name: useBuildDistribution
method.description: * Specifies the Gradle distribution described in the build should be used. * * @return this

method.name: useDistribution
method.description: * Specifies the Gradle distribution to use. * * @param gradleDistribution The distribution to use. * * @return this

method.name: useGradleVersion
method.description: * Specifies the version of Gradle to use. * * @param gradleVersion The version to use. * @return this

method.name: useInstallation
method.description: * Specifies the Gradle distribution to use. * * @param gradleHome The Gradle installation directory. * @return this
